The taste of the medicine was awful.
The laboratory tested new drugs.

back_cards.definition_en: A room for research or testing
back_cards.example_en: She worked in a chemistry laboratory.
The laboratory was equipped with microscopes.
The laboratory discovered a new species.
The laboratory ensured accurate results.

back_cards.definition_en: A person who manages or oversees
back_cards.example_en: The administrator organized the event.
The school administrator met with parents.
The hospital administrator improved services.

back_cards.definition_en: A manager of systems or processes
back_cards.example_en: The IT administrator fixed the network.
The administrator processed the applications.
